Package org.bukkit.inventory.meta

Interface KnowledgeBookMeta

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, ConfigurationSerializable, ItemMeta, PersistentDataHolder
    public interface KnowledgeBookMeta
extends ItemMeta
    Represents metadata on a knowledge book
